name: Hyper Crack
description:
Hyper Crack is a fun and challenging matching puzzle game. It can help you to kill time and train your brain.

It does not have any purchase in the app, you can enjoy the immersively game experience.

HOW TO PLAY:

You just need to click the adjacent patterns of the same color to eliminate them all. Try it now and you will love this game soon!

FEATURES:

1.Excellent time killer game!

2.High quality features and great gaming experience.

3.One tap and easy control!

4.Fascinating graphics and animation
developers: Chengdu Linlang Tianyu Network Technology Co
publishers: Chengdu Linlang Tianyu Network Technology Co
